title: Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: A vision or dream is a series of visualizations that occur during sleep. Dreams vary in their coherence and logic. There are many theories that explain seeing menstrual blood in a dream. Sigmund Freud says that dreams mean that the soul turns to them to satisfy its deep-seated desires and motives. In dreams, a person sees his motives fulfilled in the form of an event or situation, but desires in a dream are often camouflaged or hidden so that the dreamer himself does not realize their meaning. Therefore, many dreams seem meaningless and illogical. , similar to the thinking of crazy people, unlike daydreams, which are very logical. Interpretation of a dream of menstrual blood for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin, through the website Various. Ibn Sirin knows the interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a dream: Seeing menstruation in a dream means blessing, joy, and changing circumstances for the better. Seeing blood in abundance with Menstruation indicates the achievement of the desired goal and desire. The interpretation of a dream of menstrual blood for an unmarried woman in the last days of the cycle is very promising, as this vision indicates that the pressure that you are suffering from will go away, God Almighty willing. Seeing the blood of a menstruating woman means a lack of debts and many sins for the owner. The dream: Seeing the blood of a menstruating woman indicates the death of the dreamer. From Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream of menstrual blood for an unmarried woman, it appears that the anxiety and fear she is experiencing will disappear and change, God willing, for the better, and that happiness is near. It also indicates that the single woman has matured spiritually and emotionally. Seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a single woman’s dream. Seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a dream means that an unmarried woman will follow the actions and actions of the dreamer that he did in the past, especially if these actions and actions caused harm to others. Dreaming of washing clothes from menstrual blood It indicates that the dreamer is trying in various ways and means to get rid of the bad actions and behaviors that he committed in the past. Seeing menstrual blood on the dress of the girl and the girl indicates that the dreamer is suffering from feelings of guilt for what she did or problems that make her not complete her joy. If one sees in his dream Whatever he loves, he must glorify God and tell those he loves about this dream. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation at a different time for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about menstruation at a different time for a single woman differed, and most of them said that the vision is a sign of a pleasant surprise and may indicate sudden nutrition. Seeing menstruation in a dream is A sign of happy events in most cases or loss of anxiety, as dreaming of menstruation at an inappropriate time is a sign of abundant nutrition for her and may be a desire for marriage, a strong will. Dreaming of menstruation at an inappropriate time for single people indicates the approaching happy events that await her In life or a lot of good and great nutrition and getting rid of problems. Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman with menstrual blood coming out of her womb in a dream means facilitating childbirth. Seeing menstruation for a pregnant woman may indicate that she will give birth to a pious and righteous male. Black blood in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates...

title: Interpretation of seeing a gynecologist in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of visiting a gynecologist in a dream for one girl: An unmarried girl who sees herself as a gynecologist in a dream is a metaphor for her high status among her family and friends. Seeing a gynecologist in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes the high status and superiority of the woman around her. A girl who sees herself as a doctor in a dream indicates She will be a good wife in the future. When an unmarried woman dreams of her pregnancy and visits a gynecologist in a dream, this dream indicates the fortuneteller’s bad morals, and God knows best. A girl searches for a gynecologist in a dream to cure her of fatigue. This symbolizes overcoming the problems she faces in her work. The sign. As for the sick girl who sees herself in a gynecologist’s dream, it is a metaphor for her recovery from her illness. It also indicates that the dreamer will get rid of the stress and tension that he feels in his life. The unmarried girl saw in a dream that she was going to the gynecologist, and she was not Sick. It is a sign that she has a problem with her fiancé, and God knows best. As for a girl who sees herself meeting a respectable young man in a gynecologist’s office in a dream. It symbolizes health and longevity for the fortuneteller. If a girl sees herself sick or dead in a dream, this is an unpleasant vision. This symbolizes that they commit sins and repent to God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of seeing a hospital in a dream and what it shows. Interpretation of seeing a gynecologist in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the presence of a female doctor or physician in a married woman’s dream in her home means recovery from illness. In the event that there are problems between a married woman And her family. She saw a gynecologist in her dream. It is a sign of liberation from these problems. When she sees a gynecologist in a married woman’s dream, this symbolizes her husband’s great love for her. The dream also indicates the great interdependence between the wife and her husband and the stability of life between them. When a woman sees Married in a dream: A gynecologist is present in Mandi with her daughters. It is a sign of the spread of disease and infection among them, and God knows best. The seriousness of the wife’s beauty can appear in her husband’s eyes. But if a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is visiting a gynecologist, this means that her husband is suffering From illness. Or that her husband suffers from large debts and does not know anything about them. Seeing a gynecologist in a married woman’s home in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s love for her home and children. Interpretation of seeing a gynecologist in a dream about the man and its meaning. A gynecologist in a married man’s dream symbolizes the wife. When A man sees a gynecologist in his house smiling and taking care of him in a dream. It is a metaphorical expression of his wife’s love for him, her care for him, and her concern for him. As for someone who sees a gynecologist in a man’s dream and he is upset, it is a sign of the man’s cruelty to his wife, which makes her sad all the time. Seeing A gynecologist’s clinic in a man’s dream indicates an improvement in his financial situation. Read also: Interpretation of a wound in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq The meaning of visiting a gynecologist in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation Ibn Shirin explained that a pregnant woman sees a gynecologist in her dream, as it is a sign of the approaching date of pregnancy.

title: Interpretation of seeing cress in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Rashad in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen and Ibn Sirin, dreams are those fantasies that people see in the stage of deep sleep, and dreams often occur when sleep is uncomfortable or the person is very tired before sleep. Which is called a vision and contains messages from God that scholars have explained as a possibility, and in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing Rashad in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen and Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Rashad in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say: If a person sees a wise love in a dream, this indicates It is the one who sees it in good health. However, if the cardamom seeds are burned, it shows exhaustion and extreme stress that the dreamer will suffer from in his life, but if it is cooked, this vision shows that the dreamer will become good, but it will be very little. If a man sees in a dream that he is eating raw cardamom without cooking, this indicates that he will be extremely sad and that he will hear a lot of bad news in the coming period. If a man sees in a dream that he is wrapping the straight edge with his hands, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to a great experience, but if He saw that he got rid of it, and dream scholars say that it indicates that. Getting rid of worries, problems and pains. Interpretation of the dream of seeing green cress seeds in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in a dream that he is planting cardamom, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will carry out many of the tasks assigned to him, and this vision indicates that the dreamer will perform many One of the jobs that will cause him a lot. Problems in his life. His life. But if a person sees in a dream that he is plowing the garden planted in front of his house, then this vision portends a lot of good for him. But if a person dreams that he is burning with love for green sage, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will get rid of those who harbor evil for him and his family. Interpretation of the dream of seeing cardamom in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that if a person dreams that cardamom is growing in the cemetery, this vision indicates that the dreamer will die soon, but if a person sees the plant growing abundantly around him, this indicates that year in which there is a lot of goodness. If a man sees in a dream that he is eating cardamom seeds, this indicates serious problems and fears that the person will face in his next life. It is always better for a person to know that dreams can come true and can end upon waking up from sleep, and are often a reflection of the dreamer’s thoughts. The things he is trying to achieve and the feelings repressed inside him. for him.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my ex-fiancé’s family in our house

preview.html: If she is sad in a dream, this means that he still loves her in her life and she is still thinking about him in this period of her life, so follow us to learn more through the Mufsir website, the largest dream interpretation website in Egypt. The world.Interpretation of seeing my ex-fiancé’s family in our house in a single girl’s dream: If an unmarried woman dreams that her ex-fiancé’s men are in her house, and she was happy to see them in the dream. This indicates that this dreaming single girl will marry a good man in her life and be happy with him. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means that she is looking at her ex-fiancé’s family as they try to enter her house in the dream. This is an indication that her ex-fiancé wants to return to her again at this time and that he feels very remorseful at this time. And if the unmarried girl sees in a dream that Her ex-fiancé asks her to marry again in a dream. Here he explains to her that her fiancé’s family will come to her in life, and they will ask her to bring their son back into his life. And if the single girl who dreams does not receive her fiancé’s family in her home in the dream, then she feels happy about that. This is an indication However, this single woman is still in her decision and refuses to allow him to return to her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about my ex-boyfriend marrying another girl. Interpretation of seeing my ex-fiancé’s family in our house in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that her ex-fiancé’s family comes to her in a dream She is sitting with her husband. This indicates that something difficult will happen in her life and she will be upset about it happening in this period of her life, and God knows best. And if a married woman sees in a dream that her ex-fiancé’s family is asking her to marry her fiancé in the dream, the meaning indicates that there is a big problem that will happen with this woman. A married woman is in her life at this time. Either a married woman sees in a dream that her fiancé’s family saw her in a dream, and they wanted to sit in her house. Here is a clear indication that major problems have arisen in the life of this married woman at this time in her life. A dream of a married woman saw that Her fiancé’s family was near her and visiting her at home in a dream. The vision here indicates that there are people close to this dreaming woman who will make her very sad. Interpretation of seeing my ex-fiancee’s family in our house in a dream for a divorced woman. If you see a divorced woman in a dream, her fiancé’s family was with her in The house and she was happy in the dream to see them. This means that this divorced woman will marry her ex-fiancé in her next life, God willing. As for the dreaming divorced woman who sees her ex-fiancé’s family in her dream, they want to break into her house. This is an indication that there is a suitable man for her who will propose to her during this period and it will be Happy with him. And if the divorced woman sees in a dream her ex-fiancé’s family wanting to enter her house and she refuses in the dream. This indicates that there is someone close to her who will try to ask her to marry him, but she will strongly reject this matter. As for the divorced woman who dreams that her fiancé’s family is in her house and they are arguing Together in the dream. This is a clear sign

title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about traveling to a foreign country: Seeing yourself traveling in a foreign country indicates a change for the better. Whoever sees that he is traveling to a foreign country and is happy with it shows that he is working hard and striving to assert himself and achieve ambitions and goals. As for whoever sees that he is traveling and feels upset, it is a sign of moving from one place to another. Because of the difference in rulings. A foreign country in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s condition after the trip. Interpretation of seeing a sick person traveling in a dream. If the sick person dreams that he is traveling in a dream, this is a sign of his near death, and God knows best. Anyone who feels happy while traveling shows that the situation has changed for the better. But if he feels sad and has to travel, this symbolizes the worst change. Meaning of a dream about returning from a trip When one sees himself returning from a trip, this is a sign that he has paid his debt. Perhaps it indicates defecation, getting out of trouble and distress. Interpretation of traveling to a foreign country In a dream for a single woman: Traveling in a single woman’s dream indicates marriage and attachment. Whoever sees that she has traveled to a far place, many distances, indicates that there is someone thinking about proposing to her and marrying her family. If he sees that he is traveling by train, this indicates that he will move to a new life, Better than before. But if she dreams that she is carrying a red suitcase, this is a sign that she will get married soon. Seeing the white suitcase symbolizes engagement. Although black shows marriage, it will fail. Interpretation of a dream about traveling for a married woman. A dream about traveling for a married woman indicates Kindness and sustenance. Whoever brings a travel bag with new clothes inside symbolizes blessing and support for the woman and her family. As for the woman who suffers from infertility and delayed childbearing, he saw that she is preparing a white travel bag and includes new clothes that show pregnancy. If the travel bag is black and heavy, this means that there is Many problems. Traveling to a foreign country in a dream by ship. Scientists have agreed that a ship or ferry in a dream refers to a woman. Whoever sees that he is traveling by ship, this indicates that there is a benefit or benefit that he obtains through the woman. Interpretation of a pregnant woman traveling to a foreign country. If you dream of a woman A pregnant woman prepares her bag with the child to travel, and this vision is interpreted as saying that she will be lucky and that life will smile at her again in the next life with her new baby. And if you are pregnant and dream that your husband is preparing to travel, this vision is interpreted as an abundant source of livelihood that you will get from a business trip. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman traveling To a foreign country: If you dream of being divorced, you also bring a travel bag with you. Congratulations to her because her situation has changed for the better and her social and work situation has improved. If you see that you are traveling with your ex-lover? In a foreign country for work, it can be interpreted as a second chance for a better life between you, and that it is good and abundant in their return to each other, and many From nutrition.Interpretation of dreams about traveling by plane states a dream about traveling abroad by plane, but the dreamer is suffering from problems in his life, but he will solve them soon. If you dream that the plane takes off and goes from the ground to the sky, or that it descends from the sky to the ground

title: Honey in a dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of a dream about eating honey and interpretation of a dream about drinking honey from a bee.

preview.html: Bees in a dream is one of the dreams whose correct interpretation many seek to determine, especially since bee honey is healing, therapeutic, and tastes good. Bee honey in a dream by Ibn SirinBees in a dream Seeing bees in a dream means that the situation will be good, housing, and blessings, and it also indicates an improvement in the dreamer’s living conditions in various aspects, whether in the field of work or social life. Eating honey in a dream is one of the good dreams that indicate that the dreamer will find a new job that will improve his financial situation and can move to a new place where the dreamer will feel very happy. If the dreamer is suffering from a serious illness He saw himself drinking honey from bees in a dream, so this is a good sign that God will bless him with a speedy recovery and improvement in his health condition. Drinking honey from bees in a dream is good news for the dreamer from God Almighty that he is one of the people of the Qur’an, that he always remembers, and follows the path of truth and its Sunnah. Honey bees In a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing bees in a dream is one of the dreams that heralds goodness for its owner and a radical change in his life. Buying honey in a dream is good news about the end of a difficult period and serious financial problems that the dreamer was facing and the beginning of a new phase in which he gets what he desires and hears news. It makes him very happy. Distributing honey to family and relatives is a good sign that the dreamer will hear good news that he has been waiting for a long time and changes in the course of his life. If she is single, she will marry a good man with good character and live a happy life with him. Giving honey to someone close to the dreamer , including his competitors, is a good sign of the end of these problems and rivalries, the return of the water to its previous state, and the improvement of relations between them. An Egyptian site, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google and get the correct interpretations. Honey bees in a dream For a single woman, seeing bees alone in a dream is a good sign of improvement in the dreamer’s life and obtaining a new job that will return her well and a new life, or that the dreamer will be able to pass an educational stage and assume a prestigious position. Eating honey from bees and feeling the sweetness of its taste are good dreams that portend her relationship with someone she loves. She loves him and enjoys a happy life with him, and God grants her good offspring. While seeing an unmarried woman indicates that she is eating honey, but its taste is unusually mixed with bitterness, it is one of the shameful dreams that warn the dreamer of his association with an inappropriate person from whom he will suffer a lot and will be. She is exposed to many problems. If an unmarried woman sees that she is drinking honey in a dream, this is a good sign that she has ended a difficult period and begun a happy life in which she will taste happiness and satisfaction and will be able to succeed in her academic and professional life. Life. Honey bees in a dream for a married woman. A married woman seeing a bee in a dream is a good dream that indicates an improvement in her relationship with her husband and she may move to a new place with her husband where she lives a happy life full of peace and prosperity.

title: Interpretation of dreams about worms coming out of Ibn Sirin’s right hand

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about worms coming out of the right hand: As for the fortuneteller, it can refer to many interpretations related to life, depending on the events of the vision. There is someone who sees worms coming out of the finger of the right hand, or coming out of the left hand, or he may see that worms coming out of his face or His thigh or mouth. Interpretation of dreams about worms coming out of the right hand. Interpretation of dreams about worms coming out of his right hand can be good news for the dreamer about the successes that he can achieve in the immediate period, and therefore he should not hesitate to make the necessary efforts for that. A dream about worms coming out of his hand may indicate The right hand indicates the approaching salvation from the worries and sorrows that surround the dreamer, so that he can live some happy and peaceful moments, and therefore he should praise God a lot. Sometimes a dream about worms coming out of the right hand indicates interest in charitable works and charity, and these are good things for the Lord, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams for worms Coming out of Ibn Sirin’s right hand. The interpretation of a dream about worms emerging from the light by the scholar Ibn Sirin could be evidence of the arrival of the dreamer’s wide life in the next stage of his life, to obtain a lot of money that will help him live. More well-being. As for the dream of worms that come out of the hand and eat the dreamer’s body, it may be an indication of the birth of good children, and therefore the dreamer should be good news and take care of good upbringing for religious and moral reasons. With regard to the dream of worms that get out of control, it could herald the dreamer’s rise in The near future and gaining a prominent position, and therefore he must strive and work well in this matter, and of course he must pray a lot to God Almighty to grant him goodness and rewards. Interpretation of dreams of worms coming out of the right hand of an unmarried woman. A dream of worms coming out of the right hand of an unmarried girl may urge her To help and assist others, or this dream may foretell that she will soon achieve success and excellence in life, only that the dreamer must not stop working hard. They seek help from God, Blessed and Most High. Or the dream of worms coming out of his right hand may be a sign of the stressful situation that the dreamer is going through and soon he may be able to get out of it and return to psychological stability and calm, and therefore you should not do that. In despair, there are many supplications to God for the coming of happy days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about worms coming out of the left hand of an unmarried woman: A dream about worms coming out of his left hand can warn of failure and loss, and therefore the dreamer must be more careful about his academic or professional life, as well as To pray to God Almighty often for success and success in life, or a dream. It may indicate worms coming out of the left hand, but the left hand emphasizes the need to avoid forbidden ways of earning money and the need for the fortuneteller to be sure of the sources of his money and avoid doubt. A dream of worms coming out of the left hand can warn the dreamer against spending a lot of money and extravagance, as

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone dying and crying over him

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a person and crying over himInterpretation of a dream about the death of a living person and crying over him Death in a dream is a symbol of the end of something old and the beginning of a new dream, and this dream can be positive or negative and varies according to the dreamer. Thoughts and feelings. Someone dying in a dream is common, but it could also mean that you will get married soon. It can also mean that you are graduating or starting a new job. Interpretation of the death of a person in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about the death of a living person and crying over him is one of the ways to depict death in a dream. If you say that someone is alive, this reflects feelings of jealousy, hatred and resentment towards him. Whoever dreams of his death and crying If people wash him, wrap him, or carry him in a coffin, then this indicates the corruption of his religion and his hope in his religion. Whoever thinks that he died and will not rise, is buried and meets God without repentance. And whoever dreams that he lived and came out of the grave after being buried and then repents. Any person who believes that he was told that you Never died, he dies as a martyr. Whoever dreams that he is dead or dead and no one cries for him or washes him or wraps him and travels to a land that no one knows. Interpretation of the death of a living person in a dreamIf you see in a dream the death of a living person and the suffering that accompanies it, this means that you will live a long life and that you You will have a good life. Seeing someone die and then coming back to life in a dream means that you made a mistake and that you regret it. If you dream of seeing the death of someone close to you, this indicates that the person who died is still alive. A dream of hearing about the death of someone alive indicates Life indicates that a person is facing a problem or pain and may face difficulties or problems. A dream about the death of a father suggests that you will face difficulties soon. A mother who has died in a dream portends the end of the world. If you dream of seeing your brother dying, this may indicate that he will die soon. To dream of seeing a son Dead means that you will get rid of your enemies. If you dream of the death of your daughter, this means that you will be relieved from a stressful situation. Seeing the death of a sick person in a dream means that you are recovering from an illness. Interpretation of a person dying in a dream while he is dead. Interpretation of dreams about the death of a living person and crying for him if he dies dead once. Another in a dream and people cried, by God, for him without him crying and crying with tears. One of the grandchildren of this dead person gets married and she gets married. She may return to marry the fortuneteller if she is a descendant of that deceased. It is said that crying over the dead who have returned to life means consolation, relief from worries, healing the sick, and removing the dreamer’s sadness. But if you saw the death of a man again and he cried and screamed and cried over his death, this is not well. It indicates the death of one of his branches or family, or it may be a calamity or poverty for his family. Interpretation of the death of a loved one in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about the death of a living person and crying over him. I dreamed that I died and cried and many people were upset when they saw my death. The same person whom we see as a problem and renewing his dead life and crying in a dream is a sign of comfort and joy, and through all these meanings as the great commentators explain seeing a dream about the death of a loved one and crying. To him, we give you a detailed explanation. Explain the vision and its significance in detail. Interpretation of death in a dream and mourning When you see the death of a member of your family, it means that you love that person. Renewal of life

title: Interpretation of glass in a dream and seeing broken glass in a dream

preview.html: Seeing glass for a single woman, for a pregnant woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, transparent, green, yellow, red, eating, buying something glass, cleaning broken glass dishes, breaking glass, wrapped on the car windshield, plate, cup, cup, chandelier, gifting, receiving A gift, walking on crystal for married and single people by Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of glass in a dream: Seeing a cup means that the dreamer sees anxiety and sadness, and seeing a little glass means a little sadness, but a lot of glass means great anxiety. A healthy glass in a dream means that the problems will not end immediately and that they It will continue for another period, and some things that he actually sees as beautiful will cause you major problems. The green cup indicates accepted worship. The red glass is for love, but the end will be bad. The yellow glass indicates an endemic disease. If you dream that you are looking through a glass, it means that serious disappointments will cancel your dreams BrightIf you see your silhouette in a mirror, this portends betrayal, neglect in marriage and fruitless business speculation. If you see another face with your own, it means that you are living a double life and will deceive your friends. If you break a mirror or a window, this portends a negative end to projects. If you receive a piece of glass, it means that you You will be admired because of your brilliance and talent. If you give gifts of cut glass ornament, it means that you will fail in your projects. If a woman sees her lover in a woman, it means that she will find a reason to break the marriage vow. If a married woman sees her husband in the mirror, this foretells that she will find a reason to worry about her happiness and honor. If Looking clearly through a glass, you will find work, but you have to work collectively. If the glass is tinted, you will unfortunately be unemployed. If a woman sees in the mirror a man other than her husband or lover, she exposes herself in an unreserved position and causes humiliation and anxiety to her relatives. If a man dreams Seeing a strange woman in the mirror, this means that his health and work will be harmed by foolish associations. Ibn Sirin said: If he makes white glass, religion and the world will make him happy, especially if his name is written on it, and if he is a king, he will be close to pronouncing it. Whoever sees that he has a cup in his hand Then it fell and was destroyed, he divorced his wife, and if he did not have a wife, his relative died. Whoever sees in a dream and dreams that he was given a cup of water, a cup, or a cup, and in reality he was sick, then he drank water from the cup. Or if there was wine in it, or if there was drink in it. Another, like mustard and bitter melon, the cup is an expression of approaching death or the cup of death. Seeing a cup in a dream is a sign of the presence of a servant or a woman, and seeing a glass cup can lead to the clarity of hidden matters. As for seeing the cup full in a dream and a pregnant woman’s dream? If it comes out Water from a cup causes the pregnancy to fall, but if the cup breaks, as in a cup of water, this means the death of the pregnant woman. And if he sees in a dream and dreams that he is eating cups, then he will fall into great distress and distress, God forbid. Looking through a glass in a dream indicates that its owner will live in a spiritual crisis. And Sico

title: Interpretation of farewell in a dream: seeing parting in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream of farewell and crying in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Farewell to the lover. Farewell to the family. Separation between the two lovers. Imam al-Sadiq leaving the beloved in her hand. Farewell. Farewell to a dream by Ibn Sirin. Farewell. Divorce for the husband. Traveling and moving on from what a person has of good or evil, wealth or poverty, according to the extent of The place where he said goodbye to his awareness while walking, and what its elements are. In case of a farewell in a dream for a sick person, it shows his death and the divorce of the wife, and the trip and farewell indicate the return of the divorced woman, the profit of the merchant, the guardianship of the isolated person, the arrival from the trip, and death. the Apostate. . It can indicate an embrace and affection, or crying and parting, and saying goodbye can indicate a patient’s recovery. If you dream that you are saying goodbye to someone, this dream is not a good omen, as you are likely to hear disturbing news about absent friends. If a girl says goodbye to her lover, this It shows his contempt for her. If she does not feel sad in this farewell, she will soon find others to comfort her. If you dream that you are saying goodbye to people with joy, this means that you will make pleasant visits and enjoy many social celebrations, but if you say goodbye to them in a sad or sad way, you will suffer from that. Sadness of loss or loss. If you say goodbye to your home or country, you will travel to a nature far from luck and love. If you say goodbye to your loved ones or children, it means that you have a trip to take, but your trip will not be accompanied by accidents or annoying events. Among them are those who sang Poetry with this meaning: If you see farewell, go out and do not care about the distance and wait to return soon, because the heart of farewell has returned. Farewell in a dream indicates devastation, journey, and separation. Whoever sees in a dream that he is saying goodbye to his wife, he will divorce her and his friend, and saying goodbye to his friend is a separation between them. The sick person saying goodbye to his family or neighbors indicates his death. A single farewell to her father indicates the imminent date of her wedding or marriage. Farewell and crying in a dream generally indicate death, divorce, travel, or moving from one stage to another or from one place to another. If someone is sick and sees in a dream that someone is saying goodbye to him and crying, This is a sign of recovery and getting rid of his illness. Whoever sees in a dream that others are saying goodbye to him and crying, this is a sign of abundant profit that he can achieve in the coming period. Whoever sees in a dream that someone is saying goodbye to him in an unknown and poor place, then this is a sign of poverty that will fall or Great material damage that will happen to him. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is saying goodbye to someone, this means bad news that he may hear about someone close to him or about friends who are absent due to travel or work. If the dreamer is a girl and sees in her dream that she is saying goodbye to her lover and crying a lot This indicates major differences in the relationship. But if she says goodbye to him and does not cry, this indicates that she does not regret the separation, and that she is waiting for someone else to comfort her. Whoever sees in his dream that he is saying goodbye to his relatives and crying bitterly, this is a sign of sadness over the loss of loved ones. If the dreamer sees that he is leaving his home and place

Whoever sees in a dream that others are saying goodbye to him and crying, this is a sign of abundant profit that he can achieve in the coming period. Whoever sees in a dream that someone is saying goodbye to him in an unknown and poor place, then this is a sign of poverty that will fall or Great material damage that will happen to him. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is saying goodbye to someone, this means bad news that he may hear about someone close to him or about friends who are absent due to travel or work. If the dreamer is a girl and sees in her dream that she is saying goodbye to her lover and crying a lot This indicates major differences in the relationship. But if she says goodbye to him and does not cry, this indicates that she does not regret the separation, and that she is waiting for someone else to comfort her. Whoever sees in his dream that he is saying goodbye to his relatives and crying bitterly, this is a sign of sadness over the loss of loved ones.
